description: People of Pikes Peak, if you’re planning a party and know that your peers may pine for a pleasing polar treat....perfect! Kona Ice will punctually meet you any place and passionately provide everything you need: pillowy ice and a plethora of premium flavors that you can even pump yourself. As the truck (or Kona Entertainment Vehicle, to be precise) plays its peppy Calypso beats and permeates its positive vibes, it becomes pretty clear that Kona Ice is the ultimate Rocky Mountain paradise.
name: Kona Ice Pikes Peak
